hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "Whoever prays like us and faces our Qibla and eats our slaughtered animals is a Muslim and is under Allah's and His Apostle's protection. So do not betray Allah by betraying those who are in His protection

chapter.eng-name: Superiority of (praying) facing the Qiblah with the toes toward it as well
